amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 115-295 to ensure that no funds are used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 445).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 445).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. King (IA).
